wishnu dewiyan hadinwimata wiwida wu nam rashiyak bhawitha karanawa.upulwan dewiyan,shri wishnu dewiyan,aabhali,raji,wasu dewatha,nala dewatha,damora,harihara,pulawan....yana nam ee athara wenawa.wishnu dewiyange priyanbhikawa wanne shri lakshmi dewiyayi .hindu adahima walata anuwa pradana yuga satharedi wishnu sharira warna satharakin lowa pahala wenawa kiyalayi salakenne.krutha yugayedi dhawala warnayenuth,nethra yugayedi swarna hewath ran pahayenuth,dwapara yugayedi raktha hewath rathu paheyenuth,kali yugayedi nilothpala hewath nila pahayenuth lowa pahala wenawalu.ee kiyanne api me gewanne kali yuga kale....

wayasata yanakota ape handa nathuwa yanawa.me thaththwaya uda mama ehema ayin wuna eka gana sathutu wenawa.
ee amerikawedi hamuwu “athdala bandu dath athi saragi tharuniyakage” chayarupayak ewa, “kusa jathakayehi wu muladharmayak” kriyawe yedimeni.ohu pariganaka thakshanayeda ihala sudusukam labayi.
jathika aarakshawa, bhaumika akhandathawa, eekiyathwaya yana karunu sambandhayen mahinda rajapaksha mahatha sitinne ranil wikramasinha mahathata wada gawu gananak idiriyen yanna awiwadithaya.
welenda danwim nirupikawaka lesa boho deneku handunagath yoshini umanga abesekara warthamanaya wanawita sinama niliyaka lesa rasika oba hamuwata pamina sitiyi.
